item.title: Omg can someone please help me im tired of posting this
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

int delay = 0; // wait 0 seconds before starting
int period = 45000; // execute command every

new java.util.Timer().scheduleAtFixedRate(new java.util.TimerTask() {
    public void run() {
        // code goes here
    }
}, delay, period);

Executes in a separate thread, which is better than doing everything in the same thread where all the other crap is being done.

Read full topic

item.title: Omg can someone please help me im tired of posting this
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Something like this…

If you had this command for example…:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("example1")) { teleportToX = 1111; teleportToY = 1111; }

Declare:

public int timer = 90;

Then under your process method:

if(timer == 90) { timer--; } else if(timer <= 0) { customCommand("example1"); timer = 90; }

Read full topic
